comment.author: 53613072@N05
comment._content: Is there any possibility that this was taken in 1956? Not likely, I suspect, from the diminutive CBD. It is not unlikely that in that year I as a one-year-old enjoyed just this view. My family ventured to Sydney from central, very rural, Victoria (Lake Goldsmith) in that year and I had my first birthday at Taronga. With all the other creatures!!!

comment.author: 53613072@N05
comment._content: Thank heavens Taronga and all the Mosman headlands were left pretty much alone.

comment.author: 35179849@N08
comment._content: The view of Sydney CBD didn't change much for a long time,  due to height limits.   They didn't build another building higher than Culwula chambers for 50 years.
